personalInfo.name: Khairil
personalInfo.title: FrontEnd Develover
personalInfo.bio: I'm an Information Systems student who loves programming, especially Software Web Development. I'm committed to improving my skills and knowledge to keep up with the latest technology.

education.institution: State Islamic University of Imam Bonjol Padang
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Data structures, algorithms, software engineering, databases, and UI/UX design.

I took a course at Dicoding Academy to learn how to create web apps. For my final project, I made a web-based to-do list and note application. I also learned how to make web apps that are responsive, scalable, and secure.

experiences.institution: PT Astra International Tbk - TSO Auto2000
experiences.description: I built the Toyota Labuhanbatu website. It allows easy content updates, so non-technical users can manage text and images. The site has dynamic content and uses SSG. This project improved my API integration and user experience skills.
